title: Tune-in
description: The Weather App is a comprehensive application designed to provide users with current weather information, weekly temperature trends, travel recommendations, and historical weather data.
Users can also submit and view weather alerts shared by other users.
The app leverages Firebase for authentication and Firestore for data storage, ensuring secure and efficient data management.

title: Cash App
description: Designed a visually appealing web page with mockups and icons.
Explained the features of a cash app.

title: Select Your Favorite Dog
description: Created a TypeScript project that displayed random dog images based on user searches.
Included a "favorite dogs" feature.

title: Schedula
description: Developed a sophisticated web application using Next.js and Nest.js for the Schedula-web project at PearlThoughts, facilitating seamless appointment scheduling between patients and doctors.
Incorporated advanced web technologies like to enhance the overall user experience, showcasing a commitment to cutting-edge solutions.

title: Pagination Project
description: Developed logic to fetch and display products from an API, with pagination for better user experience.

title: Newsletter
description: Created a multi-page application using React Router to provide information about a newspaper, including download instructions.

title: Online Shopping App
description: Developed a full-stack e-commerce application using Node.js, MongoDB, and Express.js.
Featured user authentication and admin functionality.

title: Isodhan
description: Website show cases the services events that isodhan non-profit organization performs
The Isodhan introduce all the ancient indian warrior skills to the modern world.

title: Udyogi
description: I designed and developed a user-friendly job portal that streamlines the job search process for both employers and candidates.

The platform features intuitive search functionalities, clean and responsive UI, and a focus on user experience to ensure a smooth and efficient job search journey. (Built with technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript)

title: Chat App
description: This is a fully functional chat application seamlessly integrated with Firebase Authentication and Firestore Database.
Users can effortlessly join and participate in conversations with room name or can create a room, enabling instant and dynamic interaction.

title: Zoggy Foods
description: Initiated a crucial role in the development of an online food ordering app for the Zoggy Foods project at PearlThoughts, streamlining the food ordering process.
Streamlined the food ordering process, providing users with a convenient and efficient platform for satisfying culinary cravings.

title: Unistock-app
description: Led the development of login and signup pages for UniStock, an Android-based E-Commerce application tailored for the pharmaceutical industry.
Played a key role as a contributor, embracing a systematic Scrum methodology and utilizing Jira for efficient project management.

title: VRPI Group Edutech Platform
description: The VRPI Group website highlights their high-quality work and services.
The website integrates a cost-effective learning platform called EduTech.
